channel.title: Ultima pk recruiting! :)[RECRUITING]!
channel.description:
HEY,im recruiting for a server im currently making called ultima pk i need admins,mods,co-owners not all applications will be accepted i will add pics soon,basically started the process of making the server copy and paste this:
name on server: what job do you want: experience: why should you get this job:
JOBS AVAILABLE::
co-owner-empty admins- - - - mods: - - coders-really need,will get a crown. - - - server protecter:protects from syipker and azm and them guys. -
forum maker: -
thats all i need for now,thanks
i will post pictures soon,but as i said,i only started
i also need somebody to host and watch over the server and forums as carson said thanks

You also might need a forum hoster / server hoster…

And, you might want to try and spell azn right… i mean with a ‘n,’ not a ‘m.’
